attributes.action: Delay the unpopular closure of any more  Community hospital beds in Wiltshire until they have been shown to be surplus to requirements.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that local NHS managers, in their rush to meet financial and political targets, are disregarding the views of the local people, Practice based  Commissioners  and  Clinicians. This attitude runs counter to the spirit of the White paper ‘Our Health, Our care, Our say.’ and will have disastrous consequences for the local Health Services and for local confidence in the political process.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Delay the unpopular closure of any more Community hospital beds in Wiltshire until they have been shown to be surplus to requirements."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16498
